text: @neutralitas @objektivitat @kritischesDenkenHey Twitter, let's talk about the impact of the Ukraine invasion on equity valuations! 🤔💰New research using Refinitiv data shows that energy exposure has had a negative effect on European firms' equity returns. 💥📉But, have you considered the time-varying evidence? ⏱️👀Check out this dynamic graph that displays the impact of energy exposure on cumulated daily equity returns between 05/10/2021 and 30/04/2023. 📈🔥It's important to note that firms' energy exposure has had a negative effect on equity returns in Europe, with a one standard deviation increase in energy exposure associated with a 0.9 percentage point reduction in returns. 🤔💸So, what does this mean for investors? 🤷‍♂️Maybe it's time to consider diversifying your portfolio and looking into alternative energy sources? 🌱💦Let's keep the conversation going! What are your thoughts on the impact of the energy crisis on equity valuations? 💬#energycrisis
